author: pauld.9606
content: I mentioned a witness generator tool on the last call. Such a tool is briefly mentioned in the [Stateless Ethereum roadmap, tools section, item 3](https://github.com/ethereum/stateless-ethereum-specs/blob/master/roadmaps.md#3-emulators-of-large-state-reorgs-and-various-contract-activity). I think that we should put a priority on such a tool since it is useful to the stateless Ethereum roadmap, research section, items 5, 7, 8, 11, 12, 13, 14, and 15.

author: pauld.9606
content: I drafted some motivations and goals for such a tool here https://notes.ethereum.org/6UCmx82tQ0yoJV5KR7A6OQ.
